website_summaries.verdict: Amazon's top choice for an affordable, quality spray mop.
pros: Spray mist provides moisture that won't damage hardwood floors
Microfiber head can be used wet or dry for mopping or dusting
Patented mop pad includes scrub zones for caked-on dirt
Any cleaning solution will work with this mop
Mop pad is reusable and machine washable
cons: Some customers commented that the mophead comes off with vigorous movements

customer_reviews.title: Stupidly bought two.
customer_reviews.text: The first one worked great for a few months, then stopped spraying. I was using a vinegar solution, so I thought I was at fault. Bought another one and it stopped spraying after ONE use. I didn’t use vinegar, not my fault. Now I’m stuck with trying to find a box to ship it back in.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I got this map as a replacement for a Swiffer thinking it would be better but it's way worst. It keeps disconnecting from its base - like at least 4 times during one use. It leaks from the container uncontrollably making me put only little during each use.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: I have nothing bad to say about this mop
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have nothing bad to say about this mop. I've owned a Swiffer for years but I got sick of paying for refill mop pads and cleaning solution. I wanted something similar that doesn't require a mop bucket to use and this fits the bill. I love that you can use your own solution and wash and reuse the mop pad. Plus it seems to perform better overall in terms of picking up dirt after it's loosened it. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to find a mop that I could use my own cleaning solution. Well, this thing is crap. Going back and forth it works fine, but going around or under the table and chairs, the mop head popped off..over and over and over!
customer_reviews.author: Cindykay

customer_reviews.title: East to use mop.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop. I know that sounds crazy but this mop makes cleaning easier and you get your cleaning done quickly. I like that you don't have to go back to a bucket to get more cleaned you can just spray it from your mop. If you think one side might be getting too dirty and still have more mopping to do it is so easy to just flip the head over and keep cleaning. When done just throw it into the washing machine and you will be already for the next time.
customer_reviews.author: Margot B.

customer_reviews.title: 1 STAR IS OVERLY GENEROUS - WORST SPRAY MOP EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Save your money not only will you pay for the mop but the additional aggravation comes at no cost (other than you good humor and dirty floors. Bought two of these on for downstairs and one for upper level. Within ten days they were totally unusable. The mop head detaches when you attempt to use it - both mops - finally a very strong friend managed to get the mop head on one mop - and to my utter amazement ir came off the nest time we tried to use it. There should be minus ratings for this type of product.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 3 uses, then the bottle started leaking out everywhere. Emailed seller and o-cedar directly to try and get a replacement. No answer from either. Pissed off since I wasted my money on this thing
customer_reviews.author: Joe L.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I work at a gym and we use this to clean. I loved it so much I bought one for my house! Super easy to use, I love that you can put your own cleaning product in it, instead of buying refills separately. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: BritnieHope

customer_reviews.title: Does a nice job of cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and easy to replace mop head for washing. I highly recommend buying an extra mop head pad so your mop is always ready to use while one is waiting to be washed.
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: doesn’t it seem like the swiffer just pushes the dirt around
customer_reviews.text: For many, many years I used a Swiffer. It seemed innovative and effective and the time. However...it required a constant stream of replacement pads and solution. I always seemed to be out of both. We have 4 dogs. My husband once complained...doesn’t it seem like the swiffer just pushes the dirt around? I couldn’t disagree. Then I saw this..The Pro-Cedar microfiber mop. It has its own container that you fill with your preferred cleaner. The spray function is amazing and the microfibermop head is easily removed and washable. I’m serious folks, this is the best user-friendly mop I have ever owned. It is far more economical than any Swiffer product. So happy.
customer_reviews.author: Peaceful in Pasadena

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions (which the seller fails to provide):
customer_reviews.text: Dimensions (which the seller fails to provide): 15 1/4" along the closed edge of the mop head 16" along the edge with an opening 5 5/8" front to back 50 1/4" from floor to top of handle held vertically. The length is not adjustable. 750ml capacity of the bottle with marks every 75ml. Depending on the angle the handle is held, it sprays the floor with a very fine mist 24" - 30" out from the leading edge of the mop head. I down-graded my rating to two stars because after just a few uses the cap on the bottle leaks profusely.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Porter

customer_reviews.title: Only worked twice
customer_reviews.text: The sprayer was great to use on hardwood floors that cannot be saturated with liquid, and so I bought this mop. I liked that you could reuse the mop pads and that it wouldn't ruin the floor. After 2x of using this product, the sprayer stopped working, I checked to make sure nothing was clogged or a spring was loose. The pads do not scrub as they should after washing as directed. I had to step onto the mop to give more pressure to it. I had to scrub the floor on my hands and knees instead. I tried to tolerate this mop by dipping it into water and then squeezing out the access, which is worse than traditional mops.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rutt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mop for use on tile floors
customer_reviews.text: Tried this mop for the first time at a Barre studio and fell in love with the ease of use. Although I have swiffers this solution delivers the cleaning solution more evenly on my tile floors. That said you do need to have a cleaning solution or you can opt just to use water.
customer_reviews.author: te

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: At first I would have given this 5 stars. However, after the third use the mop head support came off. I am still trying to get it back on and frankly I really hurt my finger during the attempts.It is really frustrating. I can't say about customer service since I didn't call. I was too busy scrubbing my floor by hand. I did not use this right away as I still had some swifter pads and solution so now it is too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: TCJW

customer_reviews.title: Stops spraying after just a few uses!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the ease of using this mop, however, after a few uses, it stopped spraying and I cannot figure out why. I only use vinegar (2 tsps) and water in the dispenser. I have sent emails to O'Cedar customer service and they have never replied. I am so disappointed, as I have mobility issues and the mop was easy to use. UPDATE: I sent an email to O'Cedar customer service, yesterday I received via UPS a brand new mop. So, kudos to O'Cedar for great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: VELNA KEATING

customer_reviews.title: After a month it is leaking
customer_reviews.text: I have had it a little over a month and it is already leaking and the spray does not work well. It worked great in the beginning I am so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Must have for laminate hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: This mop is the bomb.com for cleaning my laminate hardwood floors! I tried other mops but after purchasing this one it was the answer to all of my problems. I use Frosch Vinegar Cleaner with a little bit of the Frosch Bio Spirit and distilled water for streak free cleaning. The canister is easy to remove and put back on. It takes a little doing to put on a new pad but I think that will get easier the longer I use it. I recommend having a couple extra of the washable refill pads on hand.
customer_reviews.author: kidbusymom

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be redesigned
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mop for 1 year. Aside from the head detaching and being a pain, I think it cleans okay when it does stay on. But now the sprayer will not work at all. No solution comes out. I use this with a small amount of white vinegar then fill it up with water so nothing I know of should stop up the sprayer. I’m so irritated I could scream. Actually I did scream and I threw the mop across my living room!!! Haha. It’s a good concept and I love using my own solution and love that it’s not battery powered, but those things really don’t matter if a product doesn’t work well.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Whaley

customer_reviews.title: They didn't think about being able to hang it up on a hook or nail
customer_reviews.text: It works, but it would have been great to be able to hang it on a hook or nail and have it be flush against the wall. The only way I can see to hang it is put the handle on the hook, but then the mop sticks out at a right angle. Not very practical. Who leaves their mop sitting on the floor? Most people want to hang it up somewhere off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Spray Mop
customer_reviews.text: Switched from Swiffer and I love it! Easy to use. Nice quality mop head that flips over for twice the use. It sprays by squeezing a handle, so no batteries to worry about, and it’s a nice wide mist.
customer_reviews.author: J Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting!
customer_reviews.text: So I was looking for a swiffer wet jet. Came across this and it seemed so much better. I can use my own cleaning solution which I love. And the pad is washable again I love that! That in itself saves tons. However the first time I used it the rubber piece fell off the handle. And the pad doesn’t stay on very well. So every few swipes across the floor I have to pull it back on which got very frustrating. So I’m probably still going to end up getting the swiffer unless I can figure out a way to make this pad stay on. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Darina Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: As a parent with two small kiddos, I needed a mop that could help keep the floors clean without hauling out a giant bucket of water. This mop was so easy to use straight out of the box. I love how I can use my own cleaning solution and don't need to worry about having pads on hand (like with my Swifter). My favorite feature is that you can flip it mid-cleaning session and have a fresh side. I did my hallway and front door area first and then flipped it and did the entire kitchen. Best of all, the floor dried quickly and I didn't have to worry about my two kiddos running in a wet floor!
customer_reviews.author: ed hammer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy mop.
customer_reviews.text: Good spray mop. Seems sturdy. Good substantial feel. Good weght.spay is released and you set the area then apply soft mop. I've removed and washed the mop a couple of times,by just tossing it into the washing machine. I try to "softly" squeeze the spray release handle so it will not beak. So far....so good. Perky red color.
customer_reviews.author: perry ander

customer_reviews.title: Container won’t seal and water splashes everywhere including on me.
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was great but then realized the water/cleaning solution container wasn’t sealing properly. Now I just have water going everywhere when I pull it back toward me with the handle at an angle. I’ve removed and replaced the container several times and it still doesn’t seal in the slot. Only used it three times in a small 3X6 ft area and it’s too late to return it. I contacted O Cedar twice and they said they were sending a part. Talked to James both times. He said the part was sent. Never did receive part and haven’t been able to use it. Not a way to do business.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop, I have replaced a well known product (with the purple handle) because I was tired of buying the disposable cleansing pads and the cleaning fluid always left streaks and a film on my high shine ceramic floors. So I bought this and use it with white vinegar w/water, which keeps my floors film free and streak free. The mop head washes easily and comes out like new. ( no softener in wash and don't put in dryer) I have no problem with the head falling off either.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Boop

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after the third use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hoping it would be perfect for cleaning my newly installed luxury vinyl plank flooring. The first two times I used it, it worked great. The third time, it began leaking. And I do not mean a slow leak, I mean literally pouring water out every time you moved the mop. The container that holds the cleaning solution does not seal properly anymore. Item has been used exactly as the instructions said to do. And now I’m just outside of the return window. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Bottom breaks off- cleans good when not broken
customer_reviews.text: The bottom keeps falling off which makes it useless. When it’s not breaking, it is my favorite mop ever. It does an excellent job absorbing and cleaning my tile floors without feeling like I’m just pushing around dirty water. I would give it a 5 if it stayed together.
customer_reviews.author: angie ashford

customer_reviews.title: Great with one annoying design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop- it is so much sturdier and more effective than the less expensive spray mop I originally bought at the grocery store. I only gave it 4 stars for one reason - the mop cover is a pain to put on. You sort of have to thread the mop head into the cover. It's not really hard, just a bit cumbersome and inconvenient which seems like a design flaw on an otherwise great product. On the bright side, the cover never slips off while you're mopping.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Best/worst mop: scrapes and scratches floor
customer_reviews.text: We had the previous generation of this product so I bought the new one after reading good reviews. It is an awesome design except for one fatal design flaw: the center swivel plastic piece scrapes the floor when you even press down moderately. So a mop that scratches your wood floors. Absolutely useless. Such a bummer because everything else about this no rush is 5 star. I really don't hey how they overlooked this fatal flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Jos

customer_reviews.title: Love this mop I bought extra pads and have not ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this mop I bought extra pads and have not used them yet you get 2 with it and it's really easy to use. Super easy since I have a huge floor only complaint is when getting under things which u can with this mop the whole mop head sometimes pops off and it takes a minute to pop it back on. Also it's not the easiest to put pads on but on the plus side they don't come off
customer_reviews.author: corriene power

customer_reviews.title: Ugh not like the older model!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an older model that started leaking... well this updated version is HORRIBLE!! The older one had simple reusable pads that attached to head this one has a fancier two sided version. The Velcro tabs on this one come loose as you scrub so it is a fight the entire time! I am going to try and find one of the older versions so this one can go straight in the garbage!!! On a side note this one leaks too!!! Ugh
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: mine leaks!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how or why, but mine leaks and it just SHOOTS out the solution (into one big puddle).
customer_reviews.author: Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Nice wide mop head
customer_reviews.text: The mop head is nice & wide, so makes fairly quick work of the task. The spray bottle removes easily, yet snaps securely and does not leak. The removable, washable mop head is easy to slip off for washing and velcros securely as well. Having the 2 replacements means I always have a clean one handy, without having to wash a special load.
customer_reviews.author: Stephaniek219

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it long and already not working. If i turn it upright to take the pad off, the liquid pours out all over the place. It just started doing it and can't see what is causing it. It cleans pretty well on Pergo, but doesn't seem to clean well on my luxury vinyl plank. it may be the texture of the plank and the pad don't work well together. It does maneuver well. When you flip it over, would be nice if the one side didn't have a 'cut out'. Not sure I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: SMilo

customer_reviews.title: Bye swiffer
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop. I was so tired of constantly buying swiffer supplies and just waste from it. My mom told me to get this, And I'm not disappointed. The only issue I have with it is the head keeps popping off when I tap something hard. I have to constantly remind myself to take it easy because getting the head back on is nit an easy task lol. Still awesome product
customer_reviews.author: Jessi Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Awful product
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give it 0 stars. This mop is horrible. The pad becomes un-velcroed as you are cleaning. If you bump the mop up against anything the head comes completely off. I had to put it back on 10 times just to get my kitchen floor clean. The pad just pushes everything around and I had to scrub hard just to get a minimal clean. In the time it took me to keep putting the pad and head back on, I could have mopped 3 floors with a different product. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Beyer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy - poor design
customer_reviews.text: Every time we used this mop the mop head would come unattached from the handle and then it was a pain in the ass to get it back on. Today, after much frustration with this poorly design mop we just threw it in the trash. Also the liquid container leaks when you lay it flat, which is needed to be done in order to wrestle. with reinstalling the mop head to the handle. Don't buy you will be disappointed. I have bought many products from this company which are excellent, but this was is just crap.
customer_reviews.author: Pyke

customer_reviews.title: Actually too lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I do mop more often with this thing, but the mop head is so lightweight, there’s almost no pressure on the floor, except in the middle, so I never feel like it’s really good at cleaning. Just a little bit heavier would make it more effective but still super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Simcha

customer_reviews.title: Reuseable and refillable, very cost efficient.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!! It’s well made, doesn’t feel weak. Refillable floor cleaner dispenser, no batteries, good range of spray, washable cleaning pads, also able to use both sides of cleaning pad with a quick flip. Picked up pet hair while mopping well. Was looking into a Swiffer, but can’t beat the ProMist. Less start up cost, refillable and reusable, no need to keep buying special cleaners or pads. Best thing I bought for my new home.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Changed my attitude about floor cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this mop It has been such a boost for me wit all hardwood (bamboo) floors, a lit of space and a couple small dogs that seem to collect more dust than my children ever did. Usually I only use water, but once a month I do a deep clean with method cleaner followed by polish with method wood polish. In between the dampness of the microfiber cloth really removes the dust and dirt so that the heavy clean is really quick and the floors look great. Before this almost every weekly and touch up clean required a product and too much water to be good for the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done, but needs some adjustments
customer_reviews.text: I love the wide head on this. Unfortunately, none other O-Cedar refills will go on this so I have to buy the specific ones that will only fit this one. If I push to hard sideways on the mop, the whole head falls off. I then have to grab the wet dirty cloth to push it back on. The head flipping to use the reverse side when one side gets dirty is pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lee Craun

customer_reviews.title: Mop Leaves Dirty Water Streaks & Spots
customer_reviews.text: The damp mop pads do not clean the floor evenly. It skips places & leaves streaks. The mop is difficult to maneuver to flip over. The water sprayer seems to spray enough water but the mop does pick up dirty water or soak it up. It’s like the mop doesn’t make good contact & skips over the floor. It’s almost appears the mop pad is repelling some of the dirty water. Very disappointed in O’Cedar. Seldom do I want to return an item right away.
customer_reviews.author: cherryroses

customer_reviews.title: Great sprayer, but the pad attachment & design is HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Love the pad itself, but HATE the way it doesn't get a full swipe on the floor surface, ESPECIALLY the "backwards" way. The pad attachment falls off the handle EVERY SINGLE TIME I use it and I've injured my fingers TWICE trying to get it back on! The handle is sturdy, the spray bottle awesome, the spray mechanism great! But the performance is so poor I'm trashing it after less than 3 months of use. Still looking for a good spray mop I can use my own natural solutions in for a GOOD CONSISTENT EASY QUALITY clean. Too bad it's not this one! :-(
customer_reviews.author: WASK

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the positive reviews
customer_reviews.text: Do not believe the positive reviews like I did! I kid you not, the attached SNAPPED the FIRST TIME I USED IT. Like the most vital part of this is held by a weak plastic bar. All I did was barely try to "swivel" the thing on my floor (like I have different models) and it snapped off! Rendering it completely useless. I'm very disappointed and wish I had chosen a different model I used before and never had a problem with but was swayed by all the people raving about this one. Don't listen, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: GoAskAlice777

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I won't say it cleans as well as traditional moping, but it does present with an acceptable result. I was able to clean my tile, linoleum, and hard wood floors in about 10 minutes and it's usually a 30-45 minute task. I think I can clean my floors weekly with this and do one deep clean with it once a month, as apposed to only moping once a month and it being a big deal. The spray is a bit too wide and shoots too far in my opinion. The walls or objects in front of it will get sprayed.
customer_reviews.author: Enola H

customer_reviews.title: This Solved my Dilemma
customer_reviews.text: We have a foster dog who is sick and a semi-paralyzed dog who both have multiple accidents throughout the day. Being able to pull out this ready-to-use mop makes it easy to clean up. After struggling with mops with disposable, flat, meager, fast-drying, pads that have to be attached each time -this mop is a dream come true. We have wood and tile floors so the terry cloth is super absorbant. The cloth also washes easily. I actually wash it with the smelly dog blankets on hot with several rinses.
customer_reviews.author: teacherkaren

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea and design of this; however, the third time I used it, the plastic from the swivel mop head broke off. Of course the plastic frame isn't sold separately and I didn't want to buy a whole new mop. So now I use the cloth on my Swiffer mop. It works! Just wish the original set would have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn K. Takagi

customer_reviews.title: Great mop!
customer_reviews.text: Best fillable quick mop around, came fast! It is the second one I bought, since my daughter loved mine so much
customer_reviews.author: rommasmomma

customer_reviews.title: Good for light daily cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This mop is for light cleaning, not any kind of deep cleaning. If you like to take a wet swipe at your floors daily, this may do the trick. If you have grouted tile floors, don't expect this mop to clean the grout. In fact, it kinda pushes the dirt into the grout. Again, this thing is for light cleaning only. The washable pad is sturdy and does the job, but buy extra ones since one gets dirty quickly. The Velcro that keeps the pad on must be carefully fastened or the pad will wobble off. The sprayer puts out a light, wide amount of water/cleaner; just enough to dampen the floor without soaking the mop pad.
customer_reviews.author: Textile Woman (whooosh)

customer_reviews.title: 100x better than any swiffer
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to replace my swiffer mop where the sprayer broke. This mop is amazing. It’s sprayer gets pretty far and I love the double sided feature. Plus no throw away liquid refills or mop heads. It’s very eco friendly and the mop pads are machine washable. I also love you can add whatever cleaner you want to it. I highly recommend this mop with the extra mop heads. I wash them after each use and I have hard wood so I use it often. It’s worth it to have the extra mop heads!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bloxham

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Product that Failed Miserably after 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: This product no longer works. It barely produces any spray when you pull the trigger and the little output is foamy that it fails to extend to the floor but, instead, drips and leaks on the floor and pad. Truly a disappointment. I will never buy this product again, and I hope it is never sold to any person anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: KEITH A. BISHOP

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I can wash the mopping cloth pieces and I really like that I can use whatever kind of soap I want and I don't have to buy expensive soap like the Swiffer brand products. Its way more economical and practical! Love it for my new house! I would have given 5 stars but it arrived slightly damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Avanlee Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Comes apart and won’t go back together
customer_reviews.text: Ironically, I was just about to give this mop a glowing review. I bought one some time ago at a hardware store to use on kitchen floors (vinegar and water for ceramic tile) and liked it so much I bought a second mop on Amazon to keep filled with Murphy’s Oil Soap solution for my hardwood floors. Tonight the frame that holds the cleaning pad came off the base, and I can’t get it back on. This is only the second time I have used this particular mop. They need to make these mops of better quality for this cost!
customer_reviews.author: V. Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Great for hardwood floors and Dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great for a quick clean when chasing after the wet dogs after they come inside. I love not having to bust out swiffer pads and being able to keep the same pad on for a couple days and not have to switch out like the disposable ones. The fill bottle occasionally leaks while using it but its a minor leak and since I am spraying anyways it doesnt really cause issue.
customer_reviews.author: KDR

customer_reviews.title: Mop head assembly broke off. Buy a different model
customer_reviews.text: Weak molded plastic piece that holds mop head to handle snapped off after a couple of months use. Very disappointed, will try to fix it on my own with a couple of screws, but this is a manufacturing defect. I would not buy this mop again and would not recommend it to anyone. Positives are you can use your own cleaning solution, but if the mop doesn't work, then there is no upside. Recommendation: DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: joan

customer_reviews.title: Great mop
customer_reviews.text: I usually just vacuum all my floors, but a friend has this mop and loves it so I thought I would try it. It's great! I've only used it a few times so far, but it works wonderfully and you can do a lot of floor with one mop head, which you just rinse out or throw in the washer. I love this for hard floors. It works well, it's fast, the head flips for double surface use. I would recommend this mop!
customer_reviews.author: G. Piechowiak

customer_reviews.title: Clean floors - easy peasy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because I didn't want to be committed to buying someone else's wipes or expensive formulas in specifically shaped bottles . The removable "tank' allows you to use your own cleaning solution. The trigger in the handle dispenses a spray of your chosen liquid so you control the amount by the number of times you squeeze. I like the rotating, double sided head. I'd have given it five stars if the handle was a little shorter and if the replacement heads were cheaper. Other reviewers indicate they experienced leaks - I have not. Overall, I'm satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dont_Bug_Me-I'm_Reading

customer_reviews.title: Almost effortless damp mopping.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great way to do stress-free damp mopping of an engineered hardwood floor using the absolute minimum amount of moisture- and effort.. Even a little unnoticed spilled water can damage these floors when you schlep around a bucket-even a spin bucket-which is itself a real pain from bending over multiple times to move around. And if you don't notice that some water has splashed out the floor will be damaged. Not using a bucket at all is the way to go. The handle mounted trigger sprayer applies the cleaning solution right in front of the pad at floor level so there is little chance of spilling liquid on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well.
customer_reviews.text: The head snaps off if you accidentally get too close to an edge and hit it. It’s snaps back on but then it seems to come apart easier. It cleans well and I love that the cloths are machine washable instead of disposable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, use your own cleaner in the container, and then you have the pads to wash, and I bought 8 total pads, because I wanted a lot on hand. I have a puppy and a 120 lb dog so they can be dirty.....I use my own cleaner in the mop....Unlike Swiffer mop, you have to use their solution....this is your choice of whatever cleaning solution, you want to use.... I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: LuxorRio

customer_reviews.title: Best $20 I've ever spent
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop. I still use my steam mop for stuck on messes and a real deep, deep clean. But for day to day cleaning and freshening up this is amazing. Large pad cleans areas fast. The spray is strong and spreads a fine mist far out and wide. Being able to use what ever cleaner you want and reuse the pads is a game changer. I am 35 weeks pregnant and nesting. This is a must have in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: H.Ladner

customer_reviews.title: Spray Mop
customer_reviews.text: I had an old O Cedar spray mop that finally broke after about 6 years, and I replaced it with this model. The extra pad is nice, so I can have one in the wash and one on the mop if need be. The mop head is almost twice as long as the old model, and the option to flip the mop head over saves me trips to the sink to rinse the pad after each room. The only con so far, is that it is kind of a pain to get the pads on with the mop head swiveling all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Rusty water leaking
customer_reviews.text: Did alot of research trying to find a quality mop as I am an avid cleaner. Was very please with the spray and versatility including the washable pads. But after only a couple uses with the tank filled with cool water and a touch of pine sol. The mops leaked uncontrollably. Rusty water with every stroke of the mop. Making the floor dirtier with each use. Would not reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OCedar spray mop
customer_reviews.text: What did you dislike it doesn't spray my old old Cedar sprayed better, I'm not in position to be running around returning your stuff. I still have other stuff you expect me to return. I've lost a husband then a few months later a daughter...i order which is convenient for me then happened to run around town looking for this stuff, let alone running around looking for ups or us. very disappointing cuz I love those Cedar mops
customer_reviews.author: Diva shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love that it is hand powered
customer_reviews.text: Love that it is hand powered. Sometimes the mophead can unsnap from the swiveling clip, but it is easy to reattach. Would like to have a larger nap pad for tile groves and maybe a scrubbing/scouring area but this is best for regular (probably once at least every 3 days) cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Demetrius Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Quality lacks, but easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: At first this mop did very good. After about a month, the head kept falling off any time it hit the leg of a chair or bumped into something. Head was easily knocked off, and super hard to get back on. The cloth that touches the floor is washable and they do have refills that can be purchased separately. This does not use batteries. There is a squeezable trigger on the handle that is easy to use. Bottle is easily refilled. I wish the quality was better.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Gazley

customer_reviews.title: Bought 4 Extra Refills, Only 3 Received
customer_reviews.text: Mop seems okay, but paid for 4 extra refills, only received 3. Cannot get any help from Amazon. Requested replacement, but still only 3 extra refills. Would be better off just buying the mop and purchase additional refills.
customer_reviews.author: financian

customer_reviews.title: Cleans decently but not durable
customer_reviews.text: It cleaned okay. I found the spray to be a little too much so the pads wouldn’t move very well after a room or two of cleaning. It just stopped working one day and it rusted from the inside out. We do not use harsh cleaners in our household so wouldn’t expect this to happen. We wanted an eco friendly cleaning option but if it isn’t durable it won’t make a difference. We are going to try a different brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: It leaks everywhere
customer_reviews.text: My friend has one of these mops and loves it. When I bought mine, it immediately began leaking everywhere. When I looked inside the cleaner receptacle, a small plastic piece was floating around in the cleaning solution. It leaks the entire time I use it and when it's not being used.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought one I think is better . I could snap the liquid bottle in the arm and knew it was locked in. This particular one you push in and guess it's in correctly. The other one I bought before this had a better squirt with more water being sprayed on the floor. I don't know if this is a newer model or a later model. The latter one lets out a little less water. I have tiles on a lot of my floors. I do like the width of the cloth .It covers a wide area and eliminates the use of putting my hands on a mop. Over all , it works to serve my purpose. .
customer_reviews.author: TAR

customer_reviews.title: Great improvements, economical, and better for the environment
customer_reviews.text: We had the previous model and the Velcro tabs would fall off every so often. The sprayer finally gave out (started leaking) but this after a few years of constant use. We liked the old model, but we LOVE this model. Seems to be better made and the cleaning pads stay on much better as they go around the whole head. These are so much more economical because you only use a teaspoon of cleaner and fill the rest of the container with water. It’s also more environmentally friendly because you don’t have to throw the pads away. You just throw them in the washing machine and use them again.
customer_reviews.author: Irma M.

customer_reviews.title: Best Mop Ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop! All of the convenience of the 'other' spray mop but no more need to buy batteries or disposable pads. The washable pad is two-sided so I can more than clean my whole house's hardwood floors with one pad. The sprayer is mechanical, so no batteries to replace or electronics to go bad, and you use your own solution. One tip - I originally used traditional cleaning solution that you mix with water. It can get musty smelling. Invest in a cleaner that's intended to squirt on the floor and mop up without mixing with water. It will last without getting smelly.
customer_reviews.author: TERRIE GILLAND

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Depending on how hard you squeeze the handle this mop will spray a little to a quite impressive amount of misty water. I was impressed with the distance the solution will spray. I found the pad to scrub better than most shaggy pads or swiffer pads. I love that they don't require batteries. It comes with a little measuring tool so you know exactly how much solution to water to use. I'm all for being able to refill it myself and use reusable pads. I used this to mop our entire church and it was still picking up quite well to the very end
customer_reviews.author: A.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, better for the environment!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quick mop, and isnt wasteful like swiffer with all the pads and bottles of cleaner going to the landfill. It has 1 reusable, washable pad that picks up well and a container for your preferred cleaner and water mixture. Easy to assemble (click head to handle- done) ive used it for 3 months now and tripped over it twice and it hasnt busted. If you find the liquid bottle leaking, tighten the lid and reinsert. Fixes everytime (user error)
customer_reviews.author: DOCO

customer_reviews.title: IMPROVED FROM PREVIOUS MODEL
customer_reviews.text: My other one of these leaked all over the place....... I thought it was me..... guess what...This thing has a clip that rests right above the fluid tank. You press it down snugly and NO MORE LEAKING. This thing is the bomb and I'm hard to please. If you don't get a clip attached to the handle when you get it - send it back AND get another one. And by all means don't throw the clip away.... press it down onto of the tank. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: crap
customer_reviews.text: After about 6 uses the head detached. I injured my finger trying with all my might to get it back on. I tried and tried and could not do it. I will probably be able to get it on if I use plyers to bend back the plastic but then it will just come off repeatedly again since it will be even looser. Why is it detachable in the first place? The liquid also leaked out.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Look out for something sturdy than this delicate product
customer_reviews.text: The product had some promising reviews and which is the reason I ordered but after using it for a few days, the cushion at the bottom doesn't clean properly. The mist sprayer is a good concept to help clean the floor (can use our cleaning solution). The plastic frame used under the cushion is delicate so a lot of force cannot be applied. I wanted to use it for the hard floor in our kitchen as it becomes really dirty. It was only able to clean superficially. I think this detaching design is the issue of being delicate. I hope this review helps buyers to make a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: Avijit Jain

customer_reviews.title: I like this one compared to the rest a little wider the double that switches over
customer_reviews.text: I've had different model similar to this the one that battery operated was junk this one has a simple spray you squeeze look up Pump no electric no battery. The best thing about it is it clean very well and you can flip it over and you have another clean side to work with so it's like two in one it's about time I had this my only concern is the swivel neck does not look like it would hold up very long so I try to be moderate use of it. The only thing it needs is a stronger swivel neck and they definitely got a winner
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic mop!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use, cleans well and you can use whatever cleaner added to water! Saves you lots of money in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: O Cedar fan but hate this newer model!
customer_reviews.text: I have used OCedar spray mops for years. I have LVP and tile in 80% of my house. Old version quit spraying, so reluctantly order this model. They removed all the good - push button release of dispenser, weighted head with velcro which cleaned easier and could actually do corners, nice size to rinse off in sink. This is useless and requires alot of elbow grease, cut my hand removing dispenser, too large for my large sink, double side is annoying and keeps flipping while mopping. I need to keep looking, this was a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Believer

customer_reviews.title: Awful mop
customer_reviews.text: I should've sent this mop back. It's my third type of a spray and mop. This is the worse one yet. The microfiber pad has lines on it, I'm assuming to scrub floors better, but it leaves marks on my floors. The swivel head is annoying, it flips and flops too easily. It sprays out ok, it's just a bad mop in my opinion. I will stick with Bono from now on
customer_reviews.author: Laura A. Drexler

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t love it for long
customer_reviews.text: I loved this mop. It was so easy to use and worked great. I used it almost every day...for about a month. Then it began leaking everywhere! It would not hold even a drop of water. Now it’s useless and it’s in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: mommyto3

customer_reviews.title: Poor solution bottle design
customer_reviews.text: Original promist lasted me quite awhile b4 the sprayer started to fail. So long in fact i stuck with the brand and bought this piece of junk. This "MAX" lasted less then a week b4 starting to leak everywhere leaving puddles on my expensive hardwood floors. After some examination i found a small little black rubber piece inside the bottle cap that can easily slip off either inside the cleaning solution during use or onto the floor or even down the drain while re/filling. Surely they could've designed this better
customer_reviews.author: CynMcC

customer_reviews.title: You need this in your life.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mop! I’ve been recommending it to everyone haha. It makes mopping SO easy and quick. I love that you can use your own cleaner, and everything is reusable! The mop head pads hold up well in the washer/dryer and have come out looking brand new every time. This is what the swiffer wet jet wishes it was, without the waste! I freaking love it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Works for the professionals!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I professionally clean several homes a week with this. Many require specific cleaners to be used. I just ordered extra solution tanks sand label them accordingly. I also ordered several heads so I can change them out as needed. It won't replace a good old fashioned hands and knees cleaning job but for in between those deeper cleanings it is perfect! I know steam mops are all the rage but they will void the warranty on many floors as will using the wrong cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: R.J.

customer_reviews.title: Best advertising I've seen for a mop
customer_reviews.text: I see the hilarious commercial for this on my SlingTv all the time. Best advertising I've seen for a mop ..well, ever. It was successful in making me want to buy it. The bottle removes easily; push of a button. The mop pad removes easily, but not so easily that it comes off in use. The radius of the spray is amazing, one good pump and you can cover 6x6 ft of flooring, saving you $ on floor cleaning solution in the future, and wear-and-tear on your hand squeezing the trigger for the mop. I love this mop!
customer_reviews.author: Pickle

customer_reviews.title: Can't get parts on or off
customer_reviews.text: I just received this mop and am disappointed right away. There are no instructions on how to get the bottle off and I can't even get the pad onto the mop. I saw reviews that said that the mop head keeps coming off. Well I can't even get mine on for first time use. There are other models of this mop that has easy buttons to push and the spray hole looks like it is better made and would like that model, but I can't find that one to buy on Amazon. I may be returning this without even trying it.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Best solution at this price. Should pay for it self in less tan 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Nice to be able to use cleaners of choice. Sprays much better than swifter. Makes cleaning quicker with wider head at a fraction of the cost when you consider cost of cleaner, pads and batteries and the swiffer and other similar mop units. Very pleased so far. Not commercial quality nor cost. The clip,that others have mentioned, is the weak point of the mop and would avoid removing head and stretching it out as much as possible. Don't know why this designed this way. But what I believe I'll save in pads and solution I could replace unit every 6 months with what I'll save and still have money left.
customer_reviews.author: Frank V. M.

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning the house with ease; fun for kids to use
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this and my boys fought who will use it first. Not counting on their excitement to last much longer but they did a good job this one time. :-) The mop was easy to use, having more than one pad at hand made it easy to clean the whole house quickly and washing the pads was very easy. Still to be seen if the mop and the pads will last as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Kalina Koinova

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for quick cleanups!
customer_reviews.text: First: I love how you can mix your own solution! (follow instructions) but it's saves so much money! It's a lot more sturdy of a mop then I assumed by the photo. GREAT surprise! The microfiber slip is easy to clean and it absorbs a lot of dirt!!! It definitely has a decent amount of spray that covers a wide area which seems to cut cleaning time in half. We have a busy household with lots of kids. I will purchase this in the future should something ever happen to this mop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this mop. It has an even, wide spray and is heavy enough to clean well just by pushing it around. Similar mops I've tried have been too light and I had to push down pretty firmly while mopping to get solid contact...quite a workout. This is not the case with this one. I’ve also had trouble with other mops squirting a “blob” of liquid or leaving a puddle behind. This one sprays a nice, fine, wide mist. I use it on our hardwood and tile floors and I’m really impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn M

customer_reviews.title: How to twist squeeze-esoteric
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop! It’s designed for daily touch up use or especially for in between my house cleaner. Especially great for the husband to quickly clean up Tilt it forward 90% to target a spot. Flip it over to dry or continue with cleaning To yield cleaning before you flip over to the other side easily pull off debris over your wastebasket and then just continue cleaning before you flip Can’t figure out how to twist squeeze as shown in video.
customer_reviews.author: notsotwee

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Update: The solution bottle is leaking every time I pull the mop back to me. I am really disappointed. I have not dropped it, and I was using it every day. I have two Irish Wolfhound and a Papillion. So lots of paw prints daily. Dropping this to a 2 star because of this! Absolutely love this! Light weight, but cleans great! I bought extra pads, and so glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Vikkiwolfe

customer_reviews.title: Love my mop
customer_reviews.text: Love my spray mop! Recently put engineered vinyl in my whole house. A regular mop and bucket take too long. I love that I can put anything into the container to clean my floors. The pads are washable, I purchased extra pads so I always have a clean one. The only thing I don’t like is the spray pattern. You have to have the handle perpendicular to the floor when you spray or it doesn’t hit the floor but everything else around. That took some getting use to but overall I love this mop
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Drake

customer_reviews.title: Best mop for wood floors ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and was hesitant to order this mop but oh my goodness it is awesome!!! I filled dispenser with my wood floor cleaner, non deluted as it should be used to clean wood floors,and talk about easy!!!! I usually have to spray floor set spray down and use dust mop to clean floors very tedious!!! This mop is a dream!!! I will not put off cleaning my floors any longer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Di Sue

customer_reviews.title: This is my cleaning so much easier
customer_reviews.text: I love this I've started using it for everything I bought Pergo floors that I clean with a mixture of water and vinegar so the same solution works on my tile floors and I've even used these on my windows I have 16 sets of glass doors and now I don't mind cleaning them well that might be a lie since I really hate cleaning but I don't mind cleaning them as much I even used it to clean some of my siding so I definitely recommend this the game is now how many new things can I find to clean with it walls ceiling my car shower
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: This mop lasted less than a year before the sprayer stopped working. It was a great mop for quick cleaning jobs and it was easy to use. One other problem that I had was the mop head would detach from to time and it was a pain and difficult to reattach the mop head.
customer_reviews.author: Amber R

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to use, cleans well
customer_reviews.text: The product is made from hard durable plastic. It is sturdy and firm when holding to clean areas which are difficult to reach as well. The cloth is microfibre, which cleans areas well and is itself easy to clean. It is a great mop, superior in cleaning most surfaces. It has good moisture retention to hold back the water sprayed to clean the surface.
customer_reviews.author: Aashna Agarwal

customer_reviews.title: leaks everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for 2 months and now it's trash. Leaks all over my wood floors while I'm cleaning. Works fine at 1st but should have lasted longer than 2 months!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie long

customer_reviews.title: Works really great for a few uses
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mop even though the reviews were very mixed. It worked pretty well the first time, so I bought a handful of 3rd party mop covers to replace the very basic one that comes with the mop. The combination worked very well at first, but after only a few uses the mop's tank started to leak really badly, and eventually the mop head started to fall off each time I used it. Even though Ive had this mop for a while, its had only around 10 -15 uses. I really want to like this product, but the reality is that its crap.
customer_reviews.author: John c

product_meta.title: O-Cedar ProMist MAX Microfiber Spray Mop
product_meta.description: Style Name:Spray MopMake cleaning easier! O-Cedar's double-sided microfiber spray mop delivers a better clean—not only because it saves cleaning time when compared to the leading spray mop but it removes over 99% of bacteria* with just water. The ProMist MAX is a better and faster way to truly clean your floors! *Removes over 99% of E. coli and Staph. aureus from pre-finished hardwood flooring and ceramic tile using tap water, as tested at a 3rd party lab. When switching between cleaners or preparing for storage, fill bottle with water and spray 5 times, discard remaining water. Fill bottle as usual with new solution or store empty between 50° F – 100° F
feature_bullets: Deep-cleaning microfiber removes over 99% of bacteria with just water*
DUAL-SIDED MOP HEAD- The large, dual-sided microfiber mop head flips allowing you to clean floors fast without having to change the mop pad.
REFILLABLE BOTTLE - Just fill bottle with water and add 2 small teaspoons of your favorite cleaning solution and you are ready to shine your floors.

POWER OF MICROFIBER - The ProMist MAX Spray Mop uses the magic of thousands of microfibers to absorb the smallest dirt and dust particles. When switching between cleaners or preparing for storage, fill bottle with water and spray 5 times, discard remaining water
USE WET OR DRY - Versatile microfiber pad allows you to use wet for a deeper clean to shine your floors or use dry for dusting your floors.
ONE-TOUCH BOTTLE RELEASE - The innovative one-touch release allows you to remove the spray bottle quickly and easily. For best results, change refill every 3-6 months
REUSABLE MOP PAD - Save money by washing your microfiber pad for repeat use. Pad is machine washable up to 100 times.
NO BATTERIES - ProMist MAX allows you to easily control the amount of spray with our comfort grip handle and trigger without the need for costly batteries.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars10,204 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
